channel.title: CVE Feed for deepakkite -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for deepakkite -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-7848|2024-08-22T13:11:38.449Z -- deepakkite -- user%20private%20files%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20file%20sharing%20plugin
item.description: The User Private Files – WordPress File Sharing Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Insecure Direct Object Reference in all versions up to, and including, 2.1.0 via the 'dpk_upvf_update_doc' due to missing validation on the 'docid' user controlled key. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to gain access to other user's private files.

item.title: CVE-2024-7848|2024-08-22T10:58:41.183Z -- deepakkite -- user%20private%20files%20%E2%80%93%20wordpress%20file%20sharing%20plugin
item.description: The User Private Files – WordPress File Sharing Plugin plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Insecure Direct Object Reference in all versions up to, and including, 2.1.0 via the 'dpk_upvf_update_doc' due to missing validation on the 'docid' user controlled key. This makes it possible for authenticated attackers, with subscriber-level access and above, to gain access to other user's private files.
